Documents Required:

1) *Aadhaar Card / Enrollment Acknowledgement Slip of every family member above age of 5 years.(Compulsory)
2) * Residence Proof of eligible person: ( All Documents issued minimum 5 years ago) a. Passport b. Residence Certificate (5 years residence in goa state) c. Voter ID d. Driving License
3) Ration card to define a family.

Eligibility:\n\nAny person residing in the State of Goa for five years or more is declared eligible person under DDSSY “Family” of eligible person is defined as his/her Spouse and Unmarried children and Dependent Parent(s) / In-Laws (Incase eligible Family person is female). This Family unit cannot be split..
